ModMetaData.name: Dematerializer
ModMetaData.author: HopeSeekr
ModMetaData.description:
Version 6 The BetterRimworlds Dematerializer enables you to dematerialize materials and pawns (both friendly and hostile!) from anywhere on the map into a temporary subspace bubble that will persist as long as their is a persistent flow of energy to the subspace capacitors.
**ALERT: The Dematerializer has *harsh* consequences for all higher lifeforms on the map in the case of power failure!**
